This is my ZeroNet's torrc file:

# Tor config for ZeroNet

DataDirectory data
DirReqStatistics 0
GeoIPFile geoip\geoip
GeoIPv6File geoip\geoip6

Log notice file data\notice.log

ControlPort 49051
SOCKSPort 49050

CookieAuthentication 1
